terms.title: Terms And Conditions
terms.subtitle: YakoBus Terms And Conditions
terms.term1: Book your tickets in advance with Proper Documents and register your mobile number.
terms.term2: Arrive for Boarding 30 minutes early with Original Travel Documents.
terms.term3: Follow Covid Protocols and Wear Face Masks all the time while travelling.
terms.term4: Seek Assistance from Bus Crew while On Board.
terms.term5: Donâ€™t forget to collect your Luggage before Leaving.
terms.term7: Smoking and consumption of alcohol is strictly not allowed onboard.
terms.term9: Consumption and carriage of Alcoholic beverages is highly restricted.
